1.name: Laszlo Solyom, ex-president
text: The changes have to be vetoed
The Government parties changed the constitution unlawfully
This is a more than symbolic strike against the evolution of the constitution in our 'new democracy.'

2.name: Venice Commission
text: Hungary's Fundamental Law should indeed be fundamental, instead of an arbitrary political tool

3.name: European Commission
text: [we have] serious concerns [...] about the conformity of these amendments with EU law
This could undermine the authority of the Court of Justice and could constitute a violation of the duty of sincere cooperation
[...]might endanger the fundamental principle of checks and balances in a democracy.
